item.title: Terrible Day of the Big Gundown
item.description: Terrible Day of the Big Gundown is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Sergio Garrone.

item.title: Kill Them All and Come Back Alone
item.description: Kill Them All and Come Back Alone is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Enzo G. Castellari. It stars American actors Chuck Connors and Frank Wolff, and features a film score by Francesco De Masi.

item.title: Oklahoma John
item.description: Oklahoma John also known as Ranch of the Ruthless or The Man from Oklahoma is a Spanish, German and 1965 Italian international co-production western film directed by Jaime Jesús Balcázar and Roberto Bianchi Montero.

item.title: A Coffin for the Sheriff
item.description: A Coffin for the Sheriff is a 1965 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Mario Caiano and starring Anthony Steffen, Eduardo Fajardo, Fulvia Franco, George Rigaud and Armando Calvo.

item.title: Seven Dollars on the Red
item.description: Sette dollari sul rosso is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Alberto Cardone. It stars Anthony Steffen as the main character.

item.title: Man Hunt
item.description: Man Hunt is a 1985 Western drama film directed by Fabrizio De Angelis and starring Ethan Wayne, Henry Silva, Bo Svenson, and Ernest Borgnine.

item.title: Renegade Riders
item.description: Renegade Riders is an Italian spaghetti western film. It represents the official film debut for director Enzo G. Castellari of Few Dollars for Django. The film stars Edd Byrnes and Guy Madison.

item.title: Il momento di uccidere
item.description: The Moment To Kill is a 1968 spaghetti western film.

item.title: I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin
item.description: Sartana's Here… Trade Your Pistol for a Coffin is a 1970 spaghetti western that is the third of the Sartana film series with George Hilton taking over the lead role from Gianni Garko. The film was shot in Italy and directed by Giuliano Carnimeo.

item.title: Il segno del Coyote
item.description: 1963 Italian-Spanish adventure Western movie directed by Mario Caiano
